barker_notes.barker_summary: P. T. Dimmitt to S. M. Williams, March 6, 1827. Collection of a note.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1611

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*P. T. Dimmitt to S. M. Williams, March 6, 1827. Collection of a note.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Sant Antonia, */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-06-1827">6th March 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. Williams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir I inclose you this note for collection which you will doe me the favor to collect for me, it is money lent *person_mentioned*Mr. John W. Mitchell*/person_mentioned* for to pay the expences of his *person_mentioned*negro*/person_mentioned*—which he perchesed of Mr . . .*/p*
*p*You will write me on the exchange of my note for*person_mentioned* Mr. . . . Cooks*/person_mentioned*-, and oblige your Humble svt. we have no news at Present things dull and money scarce *person_mentioned*Capt. Areas*/person_mentioned* and Mr [illegible] sends thair best respt and compliments to you*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*P. T. Dimmitt*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr. S: M. William*/person_mentioned*s en *person_mentioned*Sant. Felipe de Austin */person_mentioned*mail pd.*/p*
*/div1*
